reviewText: Amazing video of amazing outsider artists!!!!

This is a terrific film about four outsider artists.  Since works on these artists are hard to come by this is a terrific resource.  I bought it because of Judith Scott but found the other artists almost as interesting.  Very well done.

Fantastic stories of people with special talents.  They need to play this for children at school for them to have a better understanding of people with disabilities and to understand great art.  Well made movie.

This video documentary is extraordinary. If you have interests in pure creativity and understanding the human mind, this is a video for you. All the artists are fascinating. Especially Judith Scott. She personifies the fact we know so little about our creative minds and how they work. As an artist, her works are mesmerizing. This film is really great and will give you a lot about which to think. Bravo!!!

I purchased "Make Room For Daddy, Season 5" on DVD, and absolutely fell in love with the show.  Therefore, I began searching for other releases and came across the VHS 7 pack set.  Because there were really no details on what this set contained, I was uncertain what was included, but given that I love the show, I was willing to take the chance and order this set.

DEFINITELY A MUST HAVE FOR FANS OF "MAKE ROOM FOR DADDY!"  The set contains possibly a few episodes that have been released on other discs or VHS tapes, but for the most part, it was episodes that I haven't found elsewhere.  Definitely worth adding to your collection.
